attributes.action: Bring a law into force to provide community work for able bodied people receiving dole/benefits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are so many things people could do instead of simply getting their benefit and watching tv all day.  Too many people rely on benefit instead of getting out there and finding work.  A lot of people would come off benefits if they had to paint wheelchairs all day or help in old folk homes or sew mail bags etc.  Surely all these people would benefit the uk in a huge way if they were all given SOMETHING to do for their hand outs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
